parameters.Variable: No input parameters for this hook point.

name: AfterModuleChangePackage
description: Executes upon successful completion of the module function.

parameters.Notes: Array of common module parameters. See https://developers.whmcs.com/provisioning-modules/module-parameters/

name: AfterModuleChangePackageFailed
description: Executes upon failure of the module function to complete successfully. The failure reason is provided in the input parameters.

parameters.Notes: Array of common module parameters. See https://developers.whmcs.com/provisioning-modules/module-parameters/
The failure reason error string returned by the provisioning module

name: AfterModuleChangePassword
description: Executes upon successful completion of a remote module API password change.

name: OverrideModuleUsernameGeneration
description: Executes as a username is being generated on module creation.

parameters.Notes: The parameters being passed to the module function call

name: PreModuleChangePackage
description: Executes prior to the module change package function being run for a service. Allows the action to be aborted.

parameters.Notes: Array of common module parameters. See https://developers.whmcs.com/provisioning-modules/module-parameters/

name: PreModuleChangePassword
description: Executes prior to the module change password function being run for a service. Allows the action to be aborted.
